b9cb0115b63bd9b9d9dd11df5d614587ff20778d.dialogue: On the island, there was a small library.

8cf201011fe3af22ffc2bd8fe105378818d19c06.dialogue: "A world where the scent of paper woven with reality is palpable"

7bb5f349a5fa871919bcc9d7d39ce3f10f15b8bb.dialogue: [Fantasy, the boundary lines of reality tremble and sway

c1fb6ed46dfa442adc4f1c81d2267dffd0683aac.dialogue: A small world surrounded, buried, sinking, and yet, surrendering to a reality where the boundaries are lost.

0117409b3979e38ca747131239da2af818e87e69.dialogue: The white bird that chose to stay in its own will, refusing to spread its wings even as it decays.

4e9df0683d8a290d294aea6b319688bc5d5217bb.dialogue: They had never had a dream of soaring through the vast sky.

c964ffe560c520b1dbc5f4509f29d606d757a39d.dialogue: They had never had a dream of soaring through the vast sky. To have a dream of flying, is the privilege of those who cannot fly.

51e4254d7b548c0930f42db9379ebebdf955e14a.dialogue: [A semi-illiterate majority of students in the middle school, with a low literacy rate, surrounded by books that they couldn't read]

f630199451c25f7cbf10200145e8b3deccb189b3.dialogue: All stories that exist in this world

1e996df17969f73982d6e3f6e45ae29c9fb738dc.dialogue: All stories that exist in this world, the ones that I continued to devour, were my entire life.

b53414c15003bf92f5ac9964eefa2aae9495f920.dialogue: But, without any particular purpose or enjoyment, they simply turned the pages.

eb0402a3765504e8d9bfc2fbb271ec3485517665.dialogue: To outsiders, it was a strange and unusual power, but one that I had come to understand.

eaa1a7443bc1d346ce10bc52f164117978734faa.dialogue: [Like a candle that holds the flame of life

b7386f1cfb2c2584c6293df523958f9079f3eb78.dialogue: With each book I finish, I feel a sense of accomplishment.

e6d8240f8ccd6db7f816bd6b0131965b2f236c25.dialogue: With each book I finish, I feel a sense of accomplishment. As one story comes to a close, my own life also draws closer to its end.

880fa274d03e64174a31143d3c6b675727c0d15f.dialogue: As for my lifespan, it was not a matter of years or decades, but rather the number of books I had yet to read.

6cc8cbbc6eb1cfcbf9bd7562204ddcd747ce209b.dialogue: What will happen if I've read all the books in the library by then?

afaec49add7219f71ee0fd67edaf465da7b6bc8a.dialogue: I have no complaints about such a life.

d57b3bbc6e7de0371ca302aeec987b82ce333c87.dialogue: I have no complaints about such a life, and to be honest, I think it's been fulfilling.

3491cddc1062ca6139e6c51821723faaae9bf4e4.dialogue: The world inside the basket, where only words exist, has become a more wonderful and beautiful place than the outside world.

f4537abedcb9ddd99503ea6a82e59a935025c092.dialogue: They were the kind and wonderful people in my world.

c660d4123aef425e3fa3e768599f47e985bb3fe1.dialogue: They were the kind and wonderful people in my world. The library hidden deep in the forest was a place that brought me sweet happiness.

6d1902874d66ea2ce04d20ebac9d6addac7724e2.dialogue: Reality and non-reality blended together, common sense was twisted and distorted.

fbb5e27da623fa6da578731bf684770b7bca5d6e.dialogue: Reality and non-reality blended together, and common sense was twisted and distorted. It was as if the stories in the magic book, the ones that were like miracles, were becoming a reality.

85c3c5c5826e572c03a16a37d13a1441be8bca71.dialogue: If someone were to ask who was behind it, we would all answer in unison.

bacab1562de4e36b3e5164e7a1ee19d95cc6d3cb.dialogue: The white bird that chose to stay with us, its heart beating with excitement, let's measure the miracle that will unfold.

42a123793beae534130568716eb37e6ef71c8d57.dialogue: The magic book that was stored in the fantasy library.

7a3f910571141350810dc35d33d780d52161ae7d.dialogue: It was not the reader, nor the author, but the book itself that embodied the magic and miracle.

c0a954be5bf94ec8e2056368d84d9c81b2a6c54d.dialogue: It was a thing beyond the bounds of reality and fantasy, one that blurred the lines between the two.

730d9c8ba9cfce5defe31c6a110107ee174fb41b.dialogue: The moment I stepped onto the island, one step.

013f6ec841910da04750b791e26089e530513418.dialogue: The moment I stepped onto the island, one step. As I realized I had returned, a sense of excitement welled up inside me.

96171ae582d3ee16ef004cb49eba45adee70ef27.dialogue: As the morning wind blows, I feel a sense of nostalgia for the island that has remained unchanged for two years, but now I hold a love for it that surpasses nostalgia.

4be265e7177360473515f36b8eafc4b7c138e741.dialogue: I bowed slightly to the ship's sailor who had brought me here, and walked forward, devouring the nostalgia.

6e5d114eb1015b40d7a9f49dc01a36322150e534.dialogue: The sweet scent of blooming cherry blossoms, a familiar fragrance that fills the air in the spring.

642812efd3686d5e2d16fd7de67a92e5935e95bf.dialogue: I......haven't seen you in a long time"

cec67e571b9a57391b2b380f64b0b86e74efa5c5.dialogue: Two years. When I say it out loud, it's a light word.

30ec893916e9d7eeb68448173123704dec83da44.dialogue: Those two years that were as dry as a flame that had burned out, were nothing but a meaningless passage of time for me, a time that simply passed by without a care.

9ceba428feba273742280c3e5593210f8b2599c2.dialogue: Not a single memory, not a single thought, nothing at all.

2c3c2bdff5e80579ad33035ec2c638f32f211ef1.dialogue: From the feeling of the earth beneath my feet, I felt like I was coming home.

245d050161794128f2caac2ed5bebf0386633444.dialogue: From the feeling of the earth beneath my feet, I felt like I was coming home. As I walked forward, it felt like I was returning home, and I felt a sense of coming back.

cd666100f1a6c3aa9060efc871654c6fd27e93f6.dialogue: I was so immersed in my own sorrow that it was rare for me to smile.

a06a3278bf84ad7fe418d0b05d111ea43c462e69.dialogue: I rely on my memories, to return to that place.

39cb67e17f1d177b65655c5d385fea467fddc5ac.dialogue: I rely on my memories, to return to that place. The place I should head to first, after returning to my hometown, is there.

047411e734eb16ecdaf155aa12d20a4a0a075775.dialogue: [The sea, I don't like it. The morning wind is too strong and it makes me feel uneasy.

2f68f5bf2c9c95d4bd897aa99d9f4cc2cd86e823.dialogue: It was my family who welcomed me back to the island first.

0ef03bb4af92471756a20ffab1d1d1ed403dff0a.dialogue: Her name is Kisaki Tsukiyashiro. She is the real sister of Ruri, who was left behind by their mother after their parents' separation.

cb095f34c7cdb70c79431de615ad5353128ac0e0.dialogue: [It's just that her hair is so long, it must be such a hassle.

4348ab2b35fff4dbfa27af8b896c67871dac92ca.dialogue: She looks away, seemingly unconcerned. Even after not seeing each other for several months, the distance between us hasn't changed at all.

43a78f61c77d11bfbec28bf49b5f5a2f8347f6b9.dialogue: Kisaki is gazing out at the horizon.

34deed0a38039beeef09770ecb5e89b352f2d06f.dialogue: Kisaki is gazing out at the horizon. She holds back her wind-blown hair with one hand, her expression unreadable.

23248a91ab35c3a66058255a496d9c0eadd2282a.dialogue: "Then, I'll just cut off the ends of my hair right here."

caf4b4411fd195d04d66d1662b8aeaadbdd0e920.dialogue: She gave a sly smile, trying to appear amused.

86bb381b53d97cf54d5f982505940e2201547723.dialogue: You're the kind of person who suits long hair, so it's better to just leave it as it is.

342ee664317ad30b7af25e5137a46b8172ec4e9a.dialogue: [I know that, and Ruri is smitten with my hair, isn't he?"

1b1f52394d1ecb329e74d068826792d760c8dbf2.dialogue: She elegantly smooths out her hair.

78ce0af9a336fea7e1a72e16482907e0f77ad1e6.dialogue: She elegantly smooths out her hair, and a provocative gaze that seems to be inviting me, appeared.

989047a7d770948a980da413eb18332b743e2d4e.dialogue: I walked along the seaside promenade, carefully preserving the memories.

9ba3317558a17ec37a1a7f1c602eae6920465559.dialogue: I walked along the seaside promenade, carefully preserving the memories, and I couldn't help but listen to Kisaki's words every time.

a014e2d81ff7d8b2a263fa967e804d2d15e5ffca.dialogue: [How was life on the mainland? I'm sure it was a bit dull without me, wasn't it?]

fcd581aab42c5632e37f5253ace68906b044356a.dialogue: I stood alongside her, and we started a conversation that had been a long time coming.

40e41aef0225b523f80f5a2bd78c8a6f9f13f926.dialogue: "Ah, it was a peaceful and wonderful daily life"

e854453ceb26f5c9a9e42148e48034e53cbcb408.dialogue: [It was a happy and enjoyable daily life]

7175c572a43f4fc5cc215ff84f125e0811555bbd.dialogue: [A decadent and unstimulating flow of time]

998aa608222ad305efe86de7f973f72c264559ca.dialogue: You're always so quick to judge other people's daily lives, aren't you?

028953828b07e58750170803c6a55560543ad6b7.dialogue: [But, from now on, it will be a very eventful daily life, I'm sure]

3164196fbdbcd4127426d172df9dc6e5eb10efd5.dialogue: Pint, and points to himself with his finger, and raises the corner of his lips.

19e3fbc81b1ff4ef177cdbdb246e23cfd59d11fb.dialogue: [From now on, I'll pamper Ruri a lot and give him a lot of love. I'll pamper him a lot and give him a lot of love, and make him happy.]

ea722c2ae53ba10920a8bcbef58775ae219e0f1f.dialogue: [Just like that, and the others too, they're still the same as ever.

130ff6e8933eba61f2f2382f78896a45390672d4.dialogue: Kisaki, who thinks of me as a younger brother, treats me with affection.

003bf909fb13b76123accd09d32c6d890a13ad37.dialogue: Kisaki thinks of me as a younger brother, and treats me with affection. It's always been that way, ever since the past.

0a82cc811032b8632c534254165518f187a40195.dialogue: "That's why, I hate Ruri's little brother so much"

e3e76fdb1fbb168c7327dcb270d628e17c6dd696.dialogue: She looks up at me with a cold, amused smile.
